Uses of Package
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors

  • Packages that use fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components
    Basic component model.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.basic_cs.connectors
    Connectors for the basic client/server example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.chm.connectors
    Connectors for the concurrent hash map example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.cps.connectors
    Connectors for the continuation-passing style example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.ddeployment_cs.connectors
    Connectors for the dynamic client/server example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.connectors
    Connectors for the ping pong example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.reflection.connectors
    Connectors for the the reflection example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.subcomp.connectors  
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dconnection.connectors
    Connectors for the component dynamic connection pattern plug-in.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dconnection.example.connectors
    Connectors for the component dynamic connection pattern example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.plugins.dipc.connectors
    Connectors for the component data interfaces push control pattern plug-in.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc.connectors
    Connectors for dynamic remote component creation and connection.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.connectors
    Connectors for reflection.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors used by fr.sorbonne_u.components 
    Class and Description
    ConnectorI
    The interface ConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors 
    Class and Description
    AbstractConnector
    The class AbstractConnector partially implements an abstract connector between two components by assuming that the offering component implements the offered interface.
    AbstractDataConnector
    The class AbstractDataConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data rather than calling each others services.
    AbstractDataTwoWayConnector
    The class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data in a peer to peer way rather than calling each others services.
    AbstractTwoWayConnector
    The class AbstractTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic connector between components calling each others services in a peer to peer way rather than in a client-provider relationship.
    AbstractTwoWayConnector.ProxyToOtherComponent
    The abstract class ProxyToOtherComponent defines the baseline properties for the management of proxies forwarding calls to the other component for an identified sender.
    ConnectorI
    The interface ConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components.
    DataConnectorI
    The interface BasicDataConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others.
    DataTwoWayConnectorI
    The interface DataTwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others, but using the same interface on both sides and act as peers in the exchange.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.basic_cs.connectors
